title: 爱捣鼓的小水木的博客
subTitle: 一个等着裁员的java程序猿，每天无所事事，只想搞钱，喜欢钻研各种使用的技能，讨厌天天做工作上的项目，对自己毫无实用价值。
style:
<style>
  body {
    font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif;
    background: linear-gradient(to right, #43c6ac, #f8ffae);
    color: #333;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
  }
  .container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 20px;
  }
  .post {
    background-color: #fff;
    border-radius: 16px;
    box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    padding: 32px;
    margin-bottom: 32px;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease;
  }
  .post:hover {
    transform: translateY(-8px);
  }
  .post-title {
    color: #333;
    font-size: 28px;
    font-weight: bold;
    margin-bottom: 16px;
  }
  .post-content {
    font-size: 18px;
    line-height: 1.6;
    color: #555;
  }
  .post-meta {
    color: #999;
    font-size: 14px;
    margin-top: 16px;
  }
  .post-footer {
    background-color: #e9ecef;
    border-radius: 16px;
    padding: 16px;
    margin-top: 24px;
    text-align: right;
  }
  .post-footer a {
    color: #007bff;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: color 0.3s ease;
  }
  .post-footer a:hover {
    color: #0056b3;
  }
  .button {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    background-color: #007bff;
    color: #fff;
    border-radius: 12px;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
  }
  .button:hover {
    background-color: #0056b3;
  }
  .label {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 6px 12px;
    background-color: #007bff;
    color: #fff;
    border-radius: 8px;
    font-size: 14px;
    margin-right: 10px;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
  }
  .label:hover {
    background-color: #0056b3;
  }
  @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
    body {
      background: linear-gradient(to right, #373b44, #4286f4);
      color: #f5f5f5;
    }
    .post {
      background-color: #24292e;
    }
    .post-title {
      color: #f5f5f5;
    }
    .post-content {
      color: #c9d1d9;
    }
    .post-meta {
      color: #8b949e;
    }
    .post-footer {
      background-color: #30363d;
    }
    .post-footer a {
      color: #4285f4;
    }
    .button {
      background-color: #4285f4;
    }
    .button:hover {
      background-color: #3367d6;
    }
    .label {
      background-color: #4285f4;
    }
    .label:hover {
      background-color: #3367d6;
    }
  }
</style>
head: <meta name='viewport' content='width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0'/>
indexStyle:
<style>

  }

    line-height: 1.4;
    color: #555;
  }
  .index-post-meta {
    color: #999;

    margin-top: 10px;
  }
  .index-button {

    padding: 8px 16px;
    background-color: #007bff;
    color: #fff;
    border-radius: 12px;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
  }
  .index-button:hover {
    background-color: #0056b3;
  }
  @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
    .index {
      background-color: #1e1e2f;
    }
    .index-title {
      color: #f5f5f5;
    }
    .index-post {
      background-color: #2b2b3c;

      color: #4285f4;
    }

      color: #c0c0c0;
    }
    .index-post-meta {
      color: #a0a0a0;
    }

</style>
